top_comments.comment: I personally opt for some grey robes… matches my beard and hat.

Denim Jacket and Chelsea Boots are so played out imo. Everyone is wearing them. Maybe switch up the denim jacket with a corduroy trucker and the Chelsea boot with a lace-up boot, preferably with grooved outsoles for winter. Again, this is my opinion🙏🏽

This video contradicts everything u have said in the past.the jeans looks bad bulky on the bottom make u look shorter.the boots I understand. But u loved chealse boots.the jacket for chubby people make the look even fatter
I didn’t  see a single dude wearing Chelsea boots when I went out last weekend lol. Idk maybe it’s because I’m from dallas lol. We rock cowboy boots here . 🤠
